derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hilt, hilte, of Germanic origin

entry.def: The hilt of a sword, dagger, or knife is its handle.

example.ex: ...the hilt of the small, sharp knife.

entry.tran: 最大限度地;完全地;彻底地
entry.def: To the hilt and up to the hilt mean to the maximum extent possible or as fully as possible.

example.ex: The men who wield the power are certainly backing him to the hilt...
example.tran: 掌权者肯定在全力支持他。

example.ex: James was overdrawn and mortgaged to the hilt...
example.tran: 詹姆斯已经透支到最大额度并把能抵押的都抵押上了。
